content: Provide the name of a widely used social networking platform that has both mobile and desktop versions, has a user interface that allows users to share text, photos, and videos, and provides features for users to connect with others such as messaging, commenting, and following.

A widely used social networking platform that fits your description is Instagram. It has both mobile and desktop versions, offers a user-friendly interface for sharing text, photos, and videos, and includes features like messaging, commenting, and following to connect with others.
